channel.title: The Game You Would Kill to Play Early
channel.description:
Looked around, and couldn't find a thread already around about this.
[b]What game are you looking forward to most?[/b]
I personally cannot wait for The Last Guardian. I've already preordered it, and if a Collector's Edition is announced, I'll change my preorder to that. Seriously, I would preorder it if it was $150. It's the #1 reason I chose a ps3.

item.title: The Game You Would Kill to Play Early
item.dc:creator: Rollofthedice
item.description:
Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QhbQ3ZaUH6k
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vscs4z-x6eQ

Don’t get me wrong, I know the game’s gonna suck. I just want to revel in how even Harry Potter has turned into an FPS clone. That, and there’s something hilarious in gunning down homeless people with the cruciatus curse.
